mapper.select: SELECT * FROM xckmy t where t.questionTitle like #{str1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by t.uuid
mapper.update: update xckmy t set t.questionTitle= #{questionTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.questionItems= #{questionItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.questionAnswer= #{questionAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.questionSkills= #{questionSkills,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.answerAnalysis= #{answerAnalysis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.tmxzlx= #{tmxzlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t.uuid=#{uuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
